name: <jan albee angeles />
intro: A web developer with over 10 years of professional experience. Specializing in front-end development, well-versed in numerous frameworks such as react, angular and nodejs. Thrives in an environment that constantly embraces new techniques and technologies and always looking forward to working on an exciting project with an equally exciting team.

workExperiences.jobDescription: Handles component creation, theming, responsive layout, unit/automated testing, and API/UI integrations. Projects were built on versions with module federation. Incl. SkillsMatrix(React), CourseLandingPage(AngularMicroFE) and CourseAssessments(Angular).

Handles component creation, and API/UI integrations. Projects were built on Angular and KendoUI. Incl, GHD Navigator(Angular), PSF(Angular), ResourceMarketPlace(Angular), PeopleFinder(React), and FileUploader(Vue).
Handles component creation, and API/UI integrations. Project was built on AngularJS and MaterialUi. Solutio(AngularJS).
Handles page creation, PSD to HTML designs, and API/UI integrations. Project was built on CodeIgniter, and jQuery. Outsourcely(CodeIgniter).

Handles page creation, PSD to HTML designs, flash technologies for video/audio recording with cross-browser compatibility, and API/UI integrations. Project was built on Wordpress, jQuery, and PhoneGap. Japkin(Wordpress), and JapkinMobile(PhoneGap).

Handles API/UI integrations, been heavily involved with social media login integrations, maintains and updates pages of existing Job Recruitment website. A PhoneGap project that shows Gasoline stations on a map. PumpItApp(PhoneGap).
Maintains and updates pages of existing websites, been heavily involved with CSS3 animations and performance enhancements.
Handles page/widget creation, and API/UI integrations. Project was built on VanillaJs and jQuery. ContentManagementSystem(VanillaJs/jQuery).

Handles page/widget creation, been heavily involved with HTML, CSS, and JS for customizing websites. Projects were built on WordPress and Joomla. Sanctuaryo(Joomla), IlocosSur(Joomla) and PhilippinePetFinder(Wordpress).
